title: Watch, Shop & Repeat
text: Search your favourite products, learn more by watching videos and then shop right away. Interested for more, enrol for creator and start earning right away with Basic.Social App - Best Social Media App for Shopping.

section.title: For Users
section.content: Watch vidoes about your desired products, follow your favourite influencers. Buy what they use and recommend.

section.title: For creators
section.content: Create, endorse, recommend and earn immeidately. Don't wait for building a large community to get your first earning.
